website_summaries.verdict: Affordable rust protection that can also be used as a lubricant.
pros: Provides long-lasting rust protection that is also resistant to water
Has a thick consistency and is easy to spray wherever needed
Helps reduce the appearance of rust that has already formed
cons: Leaves a very oily residue, even after it dries

customer_reviews.title: Oily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to spray my outboard motor to hopefully reduce the corrosion since it is on my boat which is in salt water. One negative is it is an thick oily spray which makes whatever you spray very slick and oily. And this oiliness dies not dry. It stays slick and oily.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Works great, just don't use it where you'll see it.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, but be warned: this is not a clear solution. It sprays on and stays clearly visible. Great for things like lawnmowers or hidden parts on a car, like wheel wells or underbody. Not for visually important parts.
customer_reviews.author: Akash B.

customer_reviews.title: I tried spraying this product in my rocker panels on ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried spraying this product in my rocker panels on my f150 to see if I can get a few more years before thet rot off hopefully it works
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to tools well, water beading, and smells good.
customer_reviews.text: I was getting a film of rust on my tools and looked for a solution other than Balistol or WD-40. This stuff had a good review by Fireball Tool on YouTube. I put my tools in a shop towel and sprayed them down, then wiped the excess off with the rag. I got it all over my hands and when I went to wash them off, the water beaded up and took some work to get off, even with soap. It also smells good. It’s not strong and I didn’t notice it at first. Can place the sent, maybe coconut, but it’s subtle and doesn’t make my shop stink.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Kind Of Machine Oil
customer_reviews.text: When i get this profuct i was expecting a lot. because someone send some pgotos it was protecting also removing rust. But basically that photo WRONG!!!! It is king of machine oil not more
customer_reviews.author: Yuksel

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you'll like it!
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff! I put it on some metal patio decorations as well as my truck hitch. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: T-Mish

customer_reviews.title: Great for Rust Prevention
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 in 1 Shear, Brake and Slip Roll machine that started showing signs of rust when moved to different state that has high humidity. To stop it, I researched and found Sta-Bil Rust Prevention came as a recommended solution. I purchased and when received sprayed down my tools. It's been a several weeks with no more rust occurring. Thanks Sta-Bil!!!
customer_reviews.author: Randall Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Rust remover that also protects
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what a "warmth" rating has to do with rust stopping, but this stuff is great. I use it mostly to clean up tools, which it does exceptionally well. Leaves a protective coating. I use it with a wire brush or steel wool pad to scrape away the rust (wear gloves). Easy to get it where you want it with the tube.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Works as long as you keep using it
customer_reviews.text: It works as long as the object is coated in rust stopper. So it will need a reapplication after each and every usage. Some of the more expensive products are more forgiving.
customer_reviews.author: DHO

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Used on exterior steel door. Followed instructions. Rust is still coming through.
customer_reviews.author: Corvette 828

customer_reviews.title: We'll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.text: I used this on the undercarriage on my 2010 Chevy Traverse. It went on with ease. It seemed on the thick side, but has god coverage. I will update after I drove it in the snow and salt. The take a look after a few washes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have pipe and steel angle iron outside in the weather because I don't have enough room inside for it. I coat it with this once every month or two and it has not rusted.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works best of everything I tried
customer_reviews.text: Of all the anti-rust products that I tried, this one works the best. Not for removal of rust (I used a sandblaster to clean the items) but for rust preventative, this stuff adheres to the items and provides rust protection even if wiped clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Mc

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Apparently it only works if you have a pressure washer..
customer_reviews.author: burchalba

customer_reviews.title: Product is working fine
customer_reviews.text: I finally seem to have found my rust prevention product for my Lie Nielsen tools down in Southeast Florida. It’s a bit pricey, works great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Herbin

customer_reviews.title: Rusty trunk
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, but have not tried it on anything real rusty yet. So it is hard for me to give it 5 stars. The are I used this on was the trunk of my 1972 Mustang that had just a little rust on it.
customer_reviews.author: andrew selva

customer_reviews.title: My go to...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t even use other products anymore. This is my go to. Even smells nice. Nozzle can be a bit leaky after use...
customer_reviews.author: sycboi

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Had some rust at bottom of truck that had been repaired at body shop. After a year or so was coming back . I drilled a small hole and spray inside and it did stopped the rust so far
customer_reviews.author: Reuben B.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works better than any other stuff I have used in the past forty years
customer_reviews.author: Francis Gembicki

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use stays put
customer_reviews.text: Seems like an easy way to shield against the rathe of road salt
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product - used on 2006 Tundra
customer_reviews.text: Great product for controlling rust on the underside of my Truck. Started using the active ingredient in this product about 30 years ago (Shield) and now find it in STA-BIL -
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is more shiny and sticky like not at all what I was expecting
customer_reviews.author: Chenise B.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Used to spray the bottom side of my truck to protect from rust/salt worked great and turns the rust black works well and made the underside of the truck look a lot better as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: It worked, kept the rust from stopping and forming other places, used for 6 months
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This goes on thick and hardly runs. I use this for the underside of my truck to slow rust
customer_reviews.author: dspot

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing- removed rust from outdoor lawn equipment and keeps it from returning.
customer_reviews.author: Carl B.

customer_reviews.title: Great anti rust product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. Very similar to Cosmoline anti corrosion texture and feel. Great for pre winter rust wear. Stays on and doesn’t come off unless power washed.
customer_reviews.author: chris bolarinho

customer_reviews.title: Great for spot treatment on rusty things...
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of uses for this stuff. Currently using on rusty machine tools prior to refurbishment.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Buck

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: I used it on things that might rust...it seems to work for lubrication..time will tell about future rust.
customer_reviews.author: Jul

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It also doesn’t leave a smell for a long time which was a huge plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Stops rust.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to apply a very nicely, heavy layer and hopefully stays put for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Everett

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good product at fair price. Comparable to LPS 3 and 1/3 the cost
customer_reviews.author: Boyd R

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Greta product for rust prevention as long as you know it stays wet and does not go waxy .
customer_reviews.author: H H

customer_reviews.title: This is good stuff! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is good stuff! Highly recommend, I thought it was just gonna wash away and I would have to reapply it. It sticks on and actually helps remove some of the rust.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: easy to apply really looks like it will do a ...
customer_reviews.text: easy to apply really looks like it will do a great job protecting under carriage but this winter will tell for sure
customer_reviews.author: teddy mathews

customer_reviews.title: shovels and worked great. Still have lots of uses to go
customer_reviews.text: We flooded last year and have been using this on hand saws, shovels and worked great. Still have lots of uses to go, but loving it so far
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hatten

customer_reviews.title: Product instructions are poor, and company doesn't respond
customer_reviews.text: Product instructions are poor, and company doesn't respond. Didn't realize it is OIL! "Can be applied to any surfaces" according to instructions. Ruined a couple of outdoor items that were beginning to rust.
customer_reviews.author: Radbadad

customer_reviews.title: It is the product that fits the need.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it went on and stayed dripping wet. Shook according to instructions and are suppose to be able to put on thin or thick. It rained in the next day and it washed off with the rain. Got money back right away. Called Sta-bill twice. They called back once and I missed call. I wanted to know if yellow is normal and what may I have done wrong. Should I reorder since it IS the product that fits the need. Goes over rust, removes rust, used for loosening rust, and can be painted.
customer_reviews.author: Apollo

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought.
customer_reviews.text: This is really just a spray on petroleum jelly. It does not last very long (about a week on a vehicle underside). Buy something that chemically stops rust, only use this if you are preventing rust on a brand new surface.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Beware of possible fire
customer_reviews.text: After much hype about this product I ordered a bottle. Upon first using it I discovered the tip of the sprayer leaks badly. I would had sent the bottle back but I'm sure the US Mail would not allow it to be sent.
customer_reviews.author: Gadabout

product_meta.title: Gold Eagle Co 22003 Sta-Bil Rust Stopper 12 Oz
product_meta.description: Size:13 fl. oz.Need a lubricant, rust protection, or a penetrant? How about a product that does them all? STA-BIL Rust Stopper is an aerosol spray that delivers a protective coating for exposed metals, preventing rust and corrosion. Untreated and treated metals can rust within weeks of exposure. STA-BIL Rust Stopper prevents rust and corrosion by protecting metal surfaces with a long-lasting barrier while maintaining joint and pivot points to move freely. Use anywhere metal needs to be protected from rust and corrosion. With the flip-top sprayer this product allows you to use the stream setting for getting into tight precise areas, or for large coverage you have the fan setting. This does cling to the surface leaving a film over the surface you are treating. Great for shop, agricultural, automotive, marine, and outdoor power equipment uses. Protect all your metal surfaces exposed to the outdoor elements with STA-BIL Rust Stopper. STA-BIL is proudly made in the USA.

specifications.Cover Included: Gold Eagle Co 22003 Sta-Bil Rust Stopper 13 Oz
